pageHeader.subtitle: A Flash-based user interface for browsing online video content
pageHeader.description: >- The PBS media player was a browser for short videos contained on the PBS website. I designed and developed the interface that included a video player for the media segments.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
